comments.html: Agreed, We selected XMPP since we envision various information that needs go from control-node to vrouter. It is not just BGP, it is also all the configuration.
comments.name: Unknown

comments.html: "It's both or neither (...)". My answer would be "neither": as you wrote, it's simply a tool that gets the job done, which in this case is distributing data among endpoints, in a 1-to-many fashion.
comments.name: adamiaonr
